```r
set.seed(42)
```

## Parametric bootstrap

### Ordinary Least Squares


```r
system.time(
  pb <- PBootVAROLS(
    data = dat_p2,
    p = 2,
    B = 5000L,
    burn_in = 20
  )
)
#> Error in PBootVAROLS(data = dat_p2, p = 2, B = 5000L, burn_in = 20): could not find function "PBootVAROLS"
#> Timing stopped at: 0 0 0
pb$est
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'pb' not found
```

#### Confidence Intervals


```r
BootCI(pb)
#> Error in BootCI(pb): could not find function "BootCI"
```

#### Standard Errors


```r
BootSE(pb)
#> Error in BootSE(pb): could not find function "BootSE"
```

### Lasso Regularization


```r
system.time(
  pb <- PBootVARLasso(
    data = dat_p2,
    p = 2,
    B = 5000L,
    burn_in = 20,
    n_lambdas = 100,
    crit = "ebic",
    max_iter = 1000,
    tol = 1e-5
  )
)
#> Error in PBootVARLasso(data = dat_p2, p = 2, B = 5000L, burn_in = 20, : could not find function "PBootVARLasso"
#> Timing stopped at: 0 0 0
pb$est
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'pb' not found
```

#### Confidence Intervals


```r
BootCI(pb)
#> Error in BootCI(pb): could not find function "BootCI"
```

#### Standard Errors


```r
BootSE(pb)
#> Error in BootSE(pb): could not find function "BootSE"
```

## Residual bootstrap


```r
system.time(
  rb <- RBootVAROLS(
    data = dat_p2,
    p = 2,
    B = 5000L
  )
)
#> Error in RBootVAROLS(data = dat_p2, p = 2, B = 5000L): could not find function "RBootVAROLS"
#> Timing stopped at: 0.001 0 0
rb$est
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'rb' not found
```


